discussion.p: In the table defining the results from do_out and do_in, the specification for the result error says

blockquote.p: encountered a from_type character it could not convert

discussion.p: but from_type is not defined. This clearly is intended to be an externT for do_in, or an internT for do_out.

resolution.p: In paragraph 4, replace the definition in the table for the case of _error_ with

blockquote.p: encountered a character in [from,from_end) that it could not convert.
